articles.title: Virat Kohli, Ravi Shastri Were "Trigger-Happy": Ex-India Star's Monumental Comment On Team Selection.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India suffered an embarrassing innings and 32-run loss to South Africa in the first Test in Centurion.
articles.content: Former India cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar has opined that the team management could give a chance to Mukesh Kumar in the second Test against South Africa, starting January 3 in Cape Town. He, however, … [+1950 chars]
